Problem: The location of recently deleted files is not directly accessible but is placed under the 'Settings' option
It is unclear how to use the 'Lasso' tool, especially in copy and paste situations
The 'Zoom' function enlarges an area of the document allowing more precise writing. The icon representing this function is not representative

When using the 'Lasso' tool, it is possible to save the selected item as a sticker. This function is indicated only by the 'Save' option, which does not provide any indication of where the selection will be saved
The 'New' button does not propose creating a new folder but directly opens a new blank document in an undefined position
The icon with the three dots next to 'New' does not offer additional options for this function but provides formatting functions for documents
The 'Gallery' is not a gallery; it is a store for document templates to download
'Topic' indicates a folder, 'Divider' indicates a binder of 'Topics', effectively another type of folder
Document sharing options are not directly accessible from the toolbar but are placed under a separate option
The 'Pages' icon uses the standard icon used for 'Paste' or 'Duplicate' functions
The function is used to create interactive areas that can be covered and uncovered with a touch
The button for adding images actually allows adding other visual elements (such as stickers and gifs), but this is not clear from the icon

Once a new document is created, options for modifying it (grid paper, lines, ability to import or scan a document) are shown on the screen. If one of these options is selected, the others disappear and to modify the document, it is necessary to open the settings
Searching for a word returns a list of documents but does not provide a preview of the word's location within these documents
The toolbar cannot be pinned and can thus be accidentally moved while editing the document
It is not possible to resize elements by 'pinching' with fingers; one must use the specific buttons
